title: Trouble installing fonts from Indies Fonts books
content:
Hi,

I have got a copy of the Indie Fonts book but when I try to install some of the fonts in the CD, some of them doesn’t have any extension at all. Though the book listed them as Opentype or truetype... when I try to install them by draging into the system’s font folder, it gives an error that they are either not regular font file or damaged...

How do I install those fonts in the CD that have no extensions?

Any help would be much appreciated.

Best Regards,

 [‹ An alternative font for Trajan Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628192856/http:/typophile.com/node/46809 "Go to previous forum topic") [Dangerous Curves by Doyald Young ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628192856/http:/typophile.com/node/46862 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jch02140
